title: Drawing, "Design for an End Table in Blond and Dark Wood with Central Drawer and Closed Cabinet", 1933
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower left: BL.-S.-W./ 9/1/33; lower right: out [underlined]; inscribed dimensions; in graphite, lower left: 4 [circled]; in red color pencil, lower right: P; in graphite, lower right: SCALE 1 1/2"=1'0"/#/7452 [circled]
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for end table in blond and dark wood. Left side of table and surface in darker wood; right side and front in lighter wood. Rounded edges along right side. Drawer at top, no handle; narrow drawer at center with rectangular, horizontal pull; larger cabinet below with vertical handle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for an End Table in Blond and Dark Wood with Central Drawer and Closed Cabinet", 1933.
1933. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1198.
